extendedInfo.description: *** For a few days we had problems processing in-app purchases.  The latest update fixes that problem, and will add the credits you attempted to purchase.  After installing the update, please go to the Accounts page and wait for a few minutes. If it does not start showing you messages, click the "buy one credit button" then go back to the app and wait again.***It's no secret that Tha Phlash (http://bit.ly/thaphlash) has produced some of the most amazing icons for Android and in huge volume.  Tha Icon Ultimate brings ALL of his icons to your phone in one huge icon pack through a partnership with Droidicon.  There are 47 free styles, each with 1272 excellent icons. You can unlock 3811 more premium styles for some serious themeing.Premium styles cost one credit to unlock, and you can purchase 5 credits for $3.99 or 1 credit for $0.99.The icons can be used out of the box with the following applications:* ADW and ADW EX* Open Home* GO Launcher EX * LauncherPro and LauncherPro PlusIf you also install Desktop VisualizeR or BetterCut, the icons will work with:* Zeam* HTC SenseUI* Android 2.3 Launcher* Launch-X* Any other launcherKeywords: Tha Icon,Tha Phlash, Launcher Pro, ADW docks, ADW icon pack ADWTheme, Launcher Pro themes, Better cut, OpenHome, custom launcher icons, customize phone, customize home screen, Jon Hancock, jonfhancock, personalize, personalization, launcherpro skin, launcherpro theme, Theme, Customize Phone adwtheme, adw, customization, customizable, black alien

reviews.title: WOW
reviews.comment: I absolutely love it!  It actually made me happy.  I am still smiling.  Great stuff!  Thanks to the developer.
reviews.author: Donald P.

reviews.title: Great experience using this app. Nice icons.
reviews.comment: Really nice and helpful to costumize your app drawer. I\'ll give 5 star if there\'s more icon to choose from but thanks to this anyway.
reviews.author: Willmar Tolentino

reviews.title: Easy to use
reviews.comment: Very user friendly. Makes personalizing easy and fun. Awesome designs!
reviews.author: Jenna Lute

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Awsome app. Nicely done all the icon. And a way to choose different colour and mod is just FANTASTIC. Hope to see more recent icon will be added. Great job
reviews.author: omonisha omonisha

reviews.title: This is what\'s I had beeb looking for...
reviews.comment: Thanks for having this handy and beautify app, I had download so many themes but still not hit my head,  until I found this app....! REAL COOL   Pariya
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best Icons Ever
reviews.comment: Only artist or app i have been able to find with such creative icons. These icons are always cool.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Icon Pack
reviews.comment: This pack has a lot of icons to choose from, ranging from the usual apps to sports teams. The only downside is that there is typically only choice for an app or type of app. The search function is great and the in-app purchases work fine.
reviews.author: Matt Clouse

reviews.title: Fantastic!!
reviews.comment: Its exactly what I want and got amazing collection of icons, love it. Try to reduce the size of app, even after moving to SD card it takes more than 5MB. Still love it, Kudos developer.
reviews.author: Chaitanya Peteti

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Use with circle launcher and it\'s Flippin awesome! Smokes all the other icon apps available. Puts them to shame, for real!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Tha icon ultimate
reviews.comment: I can\'t give a revue as the star rating system only goes up to 5..!  If its every icon you can think of and more, your in the right place.  If its top end artistry and massive variety your after, again your in the right place.   So its 8 STARS from me with a possible 10 STAR rating when I\'ve tried the installed icons on mass..  BUT as I use different icons on same screen, its one by one, the custom way.!!
reviews.author: Andy Bennett

reviews.title: Miss the old setup
reviews.comment: This icon pack use to be perfect, now I can\'t even open it. I uninstalled this program and deleted the file like they suggested but with no result. Please fix. I loved this app now it just goes in the trash.
reviews.author: Nemo Lucian

reviews.title: Unreal!
reviews.comment: This app is unbelievable!! Soooo many choices! Literally over a hundred icons per pack and only a dollar!! Tha Phlash is tha Sh*t!!
reviews.author: Dante Chinni Jr.

reviews.title: Tons of icons for free!
reviews.comment: Love the variety and the ability to purchase countless others.  Awesome app!
reviews.author: Javier Guzman

reviews.title: I like it
reviews.comment: I would have givin it a 5 star rating but the fact that i have to download each style icon individually and then individually change my icons one by one and the icons u choose to change r only visible as ur chosen style if there on ur homepages. Other then that its s good concept.
reviews.author: Christopher Witte

reviews.title: The Icon Ultimate
reviews.comment: Gave it 5 stars as it produces cool looking icons that hang together and make a theme a theme
reviews.author: jeremy harrison

reviews.title: Customization made easy
reviews.comment: This app syncs my online purchases to make it super easy up make it home screen custom...and it looks great! FU douchebag Tazone Net.
reviews.author: Pauly Hoffman

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: My left hand is dressed up as a football soft monster
reviews.author: kyle askew

reviews.title: UNMATCHED
reviews.comment: No other offers so much for so little. And so convenient to use.
reviews.author: Raymond Cool

reviews.title: Love the icons
reviews.comment: I\'ve followed the icon packs for a while and finally decided to buy. Great work
reviews.author: Elias Ortiz

reviews.title: Very good!!
reviews.comment: I love this app, I replace all my app pictures with it!! My only complaint is that some of the app pictures will not download, no matter what, and it makes it very frustrating sometimes. I also wish there were more icons as I have apps whose icons it doesn\'t have.
reviews.author: Sariah Launius
